page.title: 18Wootton riding school
page.content: At the weekend from 10am till 4pm you can go to the the stables and book a ride.It is Â£3 for a ride and you can choose your own horse or pony. There are three places you can go: they are a field called Killpitts for beginners with an instrutor called Dawn.The next field is called the Chequers Inn.There is a field behind it. It is the paddock. People call it the middle ride and there is an instructor called Jackie. Then there is the big ride that goes round the fields. You have an instructor called Maureen for that.It is mainly girls who go to the riding school. I go because I like horses very much and enjoy riding.
